ygData.subject: Re: ROBES
ygData.msgSnippet: The only way to find out is to be an enchanter with the Dark Elf Illusion. You can not trade robes once they have been purchased so that idea won t work(unless
ygData.messageBody:
The only way to find out is to be an enchanter with the Dark Elf Illusion.
You can not trade robes once they have been purchased so that idea won't
work(unless this has changed).

Yours,

~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Spehar, David J
[mailto:David.Spehar@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 10:30 AM
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: ROBES

From: "Spehar, David J" <David.Spehar@...>

can a high elf wizard wear black sr apprentice robes from
neriak? I'd have
to convince one of my dark cousins to buy it for me if that
was the case.

From: Rob Kay [mailto:applezoom@...]

necromancer guild.
